Aman_Chapter1_Fundraiser: ^Z: Why ah? Oh because you posted army right?
^A: Ya la. I thought I would get police. All my cousins got police. Dunno why I kena army. I heard BMT training from morning to night. How to find time to wash my hair, dry my turban cloth-
^Z: The cloth is never-ending. Can reach JB.
^A: Shut up. I'm thinking.. should I just cut my hair? Will be easier to blend in also. Won’t stand out and get tekan.

^Z: Just cut la. Some of your cousins also don't keep their turban what. Then I have one schoolmate Gavin. He is also Singh but doesn't keep the turban. So it's not like it's required right. Just cut. Don't make things harder for yourself.
^A: But my parents will kill me!
^Z: You wanna kena tekan by your parents, or kena tekan by the sergeant major?
^I should just get it cut properly

c-0: ^ Maybe I should cut my hair myself the day before NS starts so my parents don't find out.
c-1: ^ Sigh, well if I have to cut it I might as well get a good hairstyle at a barber la.
g-0: ^Z: Eh you want I cut for you - friendship price only $10! Bro, better go barber. Later you cut off your ear by mistake then how! haha.
^Barber: eh customer waiting so I start first

Aman_Chapter1_Restroom: ^Aman is in the public restroom after cutting his hair. Staring at his new reflection in the mirror. He takes out his phone to take a photo of himself and sends it to the Whatsapp family group. The image is quickly blue-ticked (everyone has seen it) but nobody replies. Aman puts the phone back into pocket and walks out, shoulders slumped.
Aman_Chapter1_Enlisting: ^Enlistment day, Aman is lining up with other enlistees to receive his deployment pack. When his turn arrives, he is given turban cloth.
^A: Er sorry sergeant. I cut my hair yesterday. So I need a helmet.
^Sergeant: <Looks up, confused> “Hah?” Looks at Aman’s 11B. “You cut your hair?”
^Sergeant: “Wah lao eh! Now must procure helmet for you. Why you so troublesome one? Take this first and go sit down. Later I call you.”
^<Sergeant shoves duffel bag at Aman who takes it and walks away>
